title: What Does The Soccer World Think Of 5-Time FIFA President Sepp Blatter?
teaser: FIFA is embroiled in a massive corruption scandal that has fans, players, and managers wound up. NPR's Linda Wertheimer speaks with retired footballer and former USA national team member Alexi Lalas.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
